title: Border, 1810–30
description:
Three different bands of varying widths. Primary band alternates leafy sprigs of hydrangeas with vierticam, reverse-"S" curved bands that frame daisy-like flowers in diamond centers. Below this runs a continuous band in a stylized floral and dot motif, above a denticulated band. Printed in yellow, white, green and gray on black ground.

H# 357A

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 1810–30.
1810–30. Block-printed on handmade paper. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1972-42-8-a/e.
